summary: As the number of women veterans has grown—to about 2 million in FY2021—so have concerns about homelessness in this population. A VA program helps women—and other veterans facing homelessness—get services such as emergency housing and child care from a network of service providers. VA collects feedback from veterans about the program and has used it to make improvements that may be especially helpful for women...
title: Homelessness: VA Provides Support to the Most Vulnerable Women Veterans and Has Taken Steps to Improve Services
